Replies.Reply: A darkness like no other, a silence that is unsettling.
Where were you... when Eden was lost?
Where was I... when I heard we'd lost Eden? Just like every other kid on my block... I was dreaming... of being one who would be chosen to follow.
Burns are red! Bruises... blue-
Hey...? HEY!!? Someone?
Payton? Lieutenant... Payton?
Bower? Bower...?
Bower.
.in the event of mild memory loss...
Faa-uck!
Whoa! Hey... easy! Lt. Payton? You're-
Bower. Corporal... Bower, sir. I'm the-
Yes, sir. This is disorientation from-
Yes. That's right, I'm-
Sorry... sir.
I don't... really know. There's no power in the com and I can't even-
I believe so.
B.
Sir... I don't know where anyone is.
Ah... we're having some power problems-
Umm, not sure. It had to have been the flight computer. There's no one here...
.except us.
There's no power coming off the main grid. Can't fire any of the...
Dynos. Can't even open the doors.
Our 2nd Lieutenant? I don't know where he is. It was empty when I woke up.
Yeah?
Sorry. I just- Just glad to see you awake. i was... a little concerned. I didn't know what to do if-
I'm on it.
This is you, sir.
1 It's... the name on your sleep pod, sir.
it says that the memory loss is only suppose to be a momentary loss that's-
I've been awake for at least an hour and I still can't remember my... anything.
What was... your last flight, sir?
Sir? I know this is going to sound strange, but do you even know where we're going? I can remember the training, but... not the mission. Know the procedures, not the... destination.
Didn't even know the ship's name until I saw it-on the console. For all I know this was another damn training exercise-
None of the activators are working.
Without the mainframe, we can't connect.
Oh, I- didn't even think of that.
Five.
Team Four suppose to be here for the shift rotation. Where could they be?
Where could he have gone?
Whatta ya think?
Somebody... is up there.
Jesus. Somebody was trying to get out.
Well, he got out... some how.
Cycle is broken.
It's not circuitry. Reactor timing is off-set in the core. Seems sporadic, but it's not. Each revolution decreasing before starting over from the beginning.
It's trying to reconnect, but it won't until it's reset.
I dunno. I can't remember my own- but I know everything there is to know about that damn reactor.
And I know that...
That's twelve revolutions, before recycling. And this one will only last-
Our 2nd Lieutenant must have gone this way. Don't you think?
It's the only way out.
For what? If the mainframe is off-line-
But, we can at least try to-
Can't do... Sir?
You're... claustrophobic?
I can take it.
You can guide me... over two-way.
You know there's something wrong. How long can we wait in here before we have to try something?
How long did he wait?
What if no one else is awake and there's no one at the wheel?
Yeah... I think so.
What do-you remember? Anything yet?
And you're the cranky old bastard who made me take the aisle.
Dammit.
Nothing yet. Christ, not a single vent opening or- Nothing. How about on your end?
Hey?
Got an intersection here.
A whole lot of the same... nothing.
Don't say that.
I'll be damned.
I'm taking a left. Make a note.
Payton?
Payton!? Do you copy!? HEY!?
I dunno. I dunno if I can- I can't tell if I'm going in circles or- There's nothing to- Can't breath-
I just want... to stand up for God's sakes! Can't breath-
Back!? Are you kidding- I can't turn around! I can't even- Do you know how far I've gone!?
I just want OUT of this FUCKING THING!
WHAT!? Are you fucking kidding me!?
What's that?
Dream like that, sounds like you've got some... guilt issues.
Two years?
You said two years. You think we've been asleep for two years?
.eight years.
That can't be right.
Why would I-leave her? I can't even remember saying good-bye. Why would I?
Someone's been...
I'm... I'm at an angle! Shit!
Aaaaeirrrgh!
I'm... out! I'm-
I'm- I'm inside a boot locker!
I'm inside a God damn-
Make that an overhead compartment. You with me, Payton? I got out. Hear me?
Payton? Can you hear me!?
Which way is which?
Hello...?
Jesus... Christ. Jesus-
Payton...? Are you there? Answer me.
What-!?
Wait a second-
Wait- I'm part of the crew! I'm-
I won't! Please! Just listen- I'm not-
What!?
Alright, alright! Take it easy!
Stop! Stop it! Listen to me! Hold it!
You crazy fucking bitch-
But, why would she try to kill me!? She was going to slit my throat! And why would they look like that?
You should have seen these guys. They were... a very fucked up looking gang.
They sure-as-shit weren't a welcoming party from the Promenade deck! These guys were... looking to do some damage.
We've got to try to contact the bridge.
You're not!? We're not the only ones awake. Team Four wouldn't go back to sleep without waking us for rotation.
Maybe they can't. With the systems kicking on and off- Maybe they're flying blind, with no control of the LFS?
What are you talking about?
.Tanis. Planetary processing and population. We're a settler's vessel.
Elysium. This was a one-way ticket.
How could I have... left her? Why would I have done that? I loved her...
Payton!? Where is your wife?
We didn't leave them behind. No one did.
The fucking breeding tests- The wives, the husbands- The- She's on this God damn flight!
I've got to find her... before those fucking animals do! I've got to-
What's there to think about!? I remember! There was thousands of passengers that weren't part of the development team. Families that-
But... how do we-
I dunno. Officer's quarters, somewhere above D-level, I think- I don't-
Listen... if you can get me to the reactor bay. I can... reset the reactor's cycle.
Yes. If I can... we can take control of the ship. Open the doors, lights, get on the bridge. You got a better suggestion?
I don't need a rest. Which way?
Eden.

That was the report... but don't you remember the story of the one flight officer... the real story? They say he went lunar, launched the entire ship, five thousand people killed with the flip of a switch. All from a bad case of cabin fever-?
And why did they switch the rotation shifts from three years to two? And they eliminated the manual over-ride-
Well, at least we didn't wake up...
Something happened to the other team?
Have I done a circle or am I doubling back?
I've seen this before. This-
a different one. There's booby-traps, rigged to the-
Stop it! Jesus, I'm not gonna- SHUT-UP!
I'm not gonna hurt ya! Just shut the hell up! I'm gonna get you out of this thing. But, you have to be quiet, understand?
He's... team six. The unit that's suppose to follow us. He's-
Hey? You with me? You're gonna be alright. Hear me?
Huh?
Squad? My Lieutenant and I were the-
Shuttle? What are you talking about?
No, no. Hold on. I'm from this crew.
That's what we're trying to figure out!
I don't know anything.
What are you doing?
What ! ?
Help.me? Wait a second-
They- Who the hell are they!?
God dammit, WAIT! You're still an officer of this ship and at present time, your CO is ordering you to-
Payton...?
They got him! They fucking ripped him apart! They're-
They're everywhere! They're-
Aaaargh!
What...?
I don't understand. I- I don't speak-
I'm sorry. I don't- Do you... speak English?
Thanks. Thanks for... that.
I'm sorry. I don't...
I don't know what you-
You're with... agriculture!? Jesus...
Yes! I know! I'm with the flight crew!
I'M NOT IN CHARGE HERE!!
Yes, I'm going to the reactor to try to-
Right. It doesn't really matter- You should stay put. Or go back to your compartment sector- Wait for the security systems to engage. Okay? We're gonna take care of this problem.
Okay?
No. Listen, you should stay. Wait here... for the systems to- Alright?
AAAAARRRRGF! !
HOLD IT!
Knock it off! Both of ya!
Listen... nobody needs to get hurt here.
Let's all just... go easy here. I understand it's been every man for himself around here lately, but if we're going to get out of this- A little God damn solidarity wouldn't hurt.
We can work together here. We all want the same thing... right?
Thanks... again.
Yeah, yeah. I get it. We can work together on this, right?
As long as we understand each other.
Yeah... well no sympathy here. She left me with a few sore spots too, pal.
Listen, lady. We don't want any-
Huh?
Yeah. I'm... a corporal, I'm-
That's what I'm trying to figure out.
I'm heading for the reactor bay.
Just joining the program already in progress, yeah.
Oh yeah? And why is that?
Hey? Wait a second- HEY?
Hold on. Who are you?
Wait- Can't join the team without a name.
Because I need you to show me the way.
Hold on. Please- There's not much time left before we lose everything onboard.
I'm working on it.
Huh?
Sure.
My thoughts exactly.
MONTHS!?
How could you have- You telling me people have been running around on board for several months!?
Where are we going? What are we doing-
Waiting for what-?
Who are they? What the hell are those things?
They're not- They can't be from this ship. They don't seem... human. Do you think something got on board or maybe I something...
You've been living in here? You're...
Tanis.
No, I- I didn't remember just how far away it is... until now. This was a hundred and twenty-three year flight.
How could I have forgotten that?
How could we have become like this... in only eight years?
What is this?
How long?
You think we've over slept?
Do you have a radio?
I'm not the only flight crew officer awake. We're not in this alone.
I'd prefer to stay on foot.
And what is that?
Where are we?
Jesus...
My God. They're... empty. They're all-
Wait a second. My wife-
No, wait. My wife could be in here.
She's not part of the crew, but spouses were brought with. I remember there were-
Do you know where the family members are-
I don't see what he's looking at, do you?
Hey...? Let's go!
Let's get out of here! Com'on-
We can't just leave him. We have to wait-
We can't split up the team, it's all  WE'VE GOT-
The guy saved my life twice already. I'm not gonna leave him-
How the hell should I know-
Wait! I'm coming-
Jesus!
My God! Wait- Where are we going!?
Jesus... Christ- Jesus-
What the... what the hell is it!?
What is he... doing?
They're... everywhere-
What the hell happened to them!? What the hell are those things!?
I second that. Let's get the fuck out of here. Which way did we come from?
No, I mean... let's just go!
You said there was no other path.
Which way did they go-?
Didn't we come through here already?
Out? Why did we come iii-?
I thought you knew where you were going.
Could've mentioned that after the first mile. If I would have known we'd be doing laps down here-
What the hell is that?
What is this!?
Get back! BACK!
Shut off the gas!
SHUT IT OFF!
You... live here?
Left? Have you seen any?
Captain? Where!?
Why don't you come on down so we can meet properly?
Where do you think we are?
The reactor bay. Know where it is?
How long have you been awake?
Those things out there. Could it have been something... that crawled out of your lab? Something that-
Then something got on board. Some kind of life form. Something that-
What does that mean?
What?
But, why would- You're saying we'll become like them? Why would they be affected like that and we're not-
What is that... saying?
HOLD IT! HOLD IT!
Play that transmission again. I want-
I dunno. It can't be- It just-
What are you doing!? What the-
It's gone... into the final cycle.
it means we have less time then I thought. The last phase... before shutdown. It means we're... done.
What difference does it make?
For what? They're gone. Everything is gone. There's no Earth to go back to,  THERE'S NO-
And what is left of us? What's left, worth saving? This flight's over.
She's dead.
I know...
You got a radio?
DO YOU HAVE A RADIO!?
Storage Tanks, just below B-level. Mid-
What?
I dunno. But do what he says.
Child! ? That's no child! What the hell is it!?
What!? What do you mean they? How could they- That's impossible.
Why not?
These were... family members of flight personnel.
She's not here. She's dead.
She's not on this flight. She wouldn't come with me. She wouldn't marry me.
That's why I came. There was nothing left for me there. She stayed on Earth.
Marianne.
I remember her. Payton's wife.
I remember her. I remember-
Com'on.
This is our chance.
This is it. We've got to get down there before they come back.
Com'on...
I'm going as fast as I can-
Go... GO! GO!
That's it! GO! Go for it!
He's not my lieutenant.
Flight log. It'll tell us how long we've I been out... and how far we've gone.
Seems my little memory lapse has finally worn off... "Lieutenant".
Who the hell are you?
You're team four. Why would you...
You were the one... who first received the final transmission. Who refused to go back to sleep. You stayed awake...
Is it true? What have you done to us?
And that makes it okay? To play God?
Judgement will come for you. You think you could cover it? Your victims survived. Evolved. That's your creation out there. Your crime.
And you thought you'd be able to hide it?
Shut-up.
What's out there?
Shut-up!
There will be law... in whatever world we create. And you'll pay for what you've done. Believe me.
HEAR ME ASSHOLE?!
What is it?
What do you see!?
We've... we've already crashed. We've already... we're...
We've been... down here... all this time!? All this... time-
GET IN!
Hold on!
1 Put it on!
PUT IT ON!
Hey...? Hey?
It's all right. It's safe to wake up this time.
STOP IT! STOP FOR GOD'S SAKES! PLEASE!
STOP IT! YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT THIS WILL  DO TO- YOU'RE NOT- STOP! YOU'RE GOING  TO FUCKING KILL US ALL!
There is a conflict in his eyes, memories trying to return.
As he stares at the emblem, it seems memories are returning, a frown hardening on his face.
Fear over comes BOWER.
An image FLASHES past, EVALON smiling as BOWER kneels next to her, gripping her hands.
Who are you?
Bower?
Corporal?
corporal... Bower.
Wanna get that fucking light out of my eyes, pal?
Where... are we?
Elysium...? Where are we?
Where's the... rest of the crew? It's our shift? Our rotation-
Aren't they suppose to be here... to wake us?
Hit the lights, will ya?
Who woke you up?
Cold in here.
Bower .
Until I have two coffees you're just gonna have to repeat all this shit, so let's just idle here for a bit.
Coffee?
Good man.
How do you know that?
Very reassuring. I guess when you gamma the brain into extended REM, sometimes it can take a while to get it back.
Listen, the last time I crawled out of a hyper bunk, it took me... quite a while to get it all back.
Don't recall. The Kuiper Belt odyssey?
I've gone through this before. I just can't remember why I would agree to do it again.
I figured you'd tell me.
Trust me, it's not. if this is a simulation...
Someone is taking the joke a little far.
Figures. We can ride two hundred thousand tons of space freighter across the galaxy without a dent in the hood, but can't get one good cup of coffee.
Payton on the con. Respond? This is Lt.
Five? How do you know that?
Fucking teamsters. Maybe they couldn't get to us.
The power systems must be free-floating off blown circuits or something. The over-ride grid won't even lock in.
I think we need to find a deck of cards and call the union.
Hmm. Ventilation... maybe. Systems keep re-booting after each surge. That could be anything.
I say we get out of here. I'd rather be up and out then stuck in the trunk.
We're not far from the bridge but without the circuits locked in... I don't know how we could ever get this thing open.
Ironic. I think it was built to protect us.
What?
How the hell do you know that?
The training stuck.
Now if we only had a monkey and a rope.
Must have.
I think we're better off... waiting here-
We're not going to be able to get to the bridge or even be able to open that door from the other side-
Do you remember just how big this ship is, kid? We don't know where that will come out, if at all-
I can't do that.
Listen, I have to take a handful of Doxitol just to get in the hyper-bunk.
I can take a lot, that's not one of 'em.
Just in case...
.there's mail you need to open quickly.
Wife...?
Must be newlyweds. How can you forget something like that?
Some pieces.
Still a little fuzzy but you're the cocky little shit who wanted the window seat?
Give it some more time, pal.
Power surges keep coming across in longer increments, just like you said.
I'm gonna keep trying to get inside and run a dyno. Or at least try to get a pizza delivered.
Easy, pal. Breath easy. Listen to me-
Bower? BOWER!? Stop it. Stop it!
Put your mind somewhere else-
Well... this may not be the best time to tell you, but I got the door open.
Well, you aren't here on default. This was a select pick. This flight was...
We're not just doing speed laps on the belt. This was something... special.
What's wrong?
Bower!? What happened? Bower!?
Bower...!?
Jesus, don't scare me like that! Where are you?
Bower...? You alright? BOWER!?
Bower? Do you hear me? Bower...?
Bower? You there?
Com'on, man. You there?
Bower:?
Bower? Can you hear me?
Bower? Answer me, God dammit.
If they're in there... why haven't they thrown the security hammer into lock down? Seal and freeze it until the emergency units wake?
Either way we can't assume help will be coming. On-board or off. Out here, there is no rescue. There is no turning around. This thing wasn't even built...
This is no regular transport. We're not out collecting data off the belt or hauling cargo... we are the cargo. It was a single launch trajectory for...
What?
No, listen to me! LISTEN! You know how big this ship is and there's no way of knowing exactly where- If you go on some wild goose chase to try to find her-
And then we would be no closer to getting out of this situation with even less time to regain control of the ship.
Our job is to obtain control of this ship. Once we've taken control of the systems, finding them would be easy. Are you hearing me? We save the ship... we can save them all.
I can guide you. Find out where you are.
Take it.
Back toward the flight decks. Back to me.
What chance have you got out there on your own? We'll figure out a way to breach the command bridge-
I don't know vet. Hold on-
What did you say?
Of all things to remember, why would you pick that?
No, no, no. You're talking about- Eden was lost because of a mechanical failure,  I simple as that. A systems malfunction.
spook story, along with a million others.
They did that for obvious reasons, not because of Eden.
Who says we didn't?
Bower!? BOWER!? Answer me God Dammit!
GOD DAMMIT!
WHO'S THERE!?
IDENTIFY YOURSELF!
Dower...? That can't be... you-
You want in? Come and get it you fu-
Who the hell... are you!?
Easy... Easy. You're all right.
EASY! I'm here to help you!
Com'on. Try to drink a little. Here.
What's your name? Huh? Can you hear me?
What's that? Gallo...?
Corporal... Gallo?
Where did you come from, Gallo?
The bridge!? Where are we? What's happened? Can you tell me-
Corporal?
Tell me... what happened?
Team Four. Flight Team... Four?
Just... checking you.
To make sure you're... alright. You...
Payton... Lieutenant Payton.
That's right. You're Team Four? You're suppose to be... my predecessor.
You said... you came from the bridge?
Where are we? I can't get guidance off this system and I have no idea where-
Well, what did you see? How did--
Easy. I just want to make sure...
.you're okay-
Is this your blood... Corporal?
Whose blood is it?
Who didn't?
i Something was wrong with who?
Pandorum. Both of them-?
I believe you.
It's just a sedative. Help you relax-
Take it easy. We're on the same team here. Alright?
What?
I've seen it before. But nothing that-
I didn't say that-
That's what they say.
The truth... about what?
What transmission?
Earth... is gone?
In one day... it had to be nuclear or-?
Oh my God...
Easy...
How could they... how could they have let this happen?
BOWER! I'm here! Where are you?
I hear you. How do we get you in there?
I think the direct channels are fried.
The bridge. As soon as we're up we'll be able to take control of guidance. But only from on the bridge.
He can do it.
He's the only shot we have. Gotta have a little faith.
What are you suggesting, Corporal?
Launching ourselves... into deep space when we don't even know where we are? We wouldn't last more then a few days inside those things. That's suicide-
Stand down, Corporal. We're not going to abandon anything and we're not going to leave them behind-
I said stand down, Corporal! That's an order!
He's in! That's the reactor's activator panel. We're going to make it out of  I this. Trust me.
Gallo... you have to listen to me...
Don't... do what?
Take it easy-
Easy...
I'm giving you an order...
.to stand-down... Corporal.
Think about what you're doing...
This won't work...
just think about what you're doing-
It wasn't the crew that was sick, was it?
What did you really do to them...?
For your own good-
You're not well, Corporal. You just need the proper treatment-
This isn't your fault-
Your mind... has turned against itself.
I My God... he did it! He did it.
shut-up.
SHUT-UP!

The control panel on a sleep-chamber is FLASHING as a passenger KICKS his hatch open from the inside. The haggard and bewildered passenger crawls out to find himself in the middle of CHAOS. Before he can get a breath he's attacked by  HUNTERS.
I MEAN IT!
STOP IT!
I'll FUCKING CARVE YOU UP!
I can't... breath!
Keine Bewegung!
Don't move!
Don't you move MOTHER FUCKER!
DON'T FUCKING MOVE!
Take them off!
SHOES! I'll gut your ass-
Who the hell are you?
You're... part of the flight crew?
I didn't think there was any flight crew left. What's happened to us?
Gee, you think? Where are you going?
You just wake up?
You'll never make it.
You're going the wrong direction.
Nobody.
Team? Why would I want to join?
To the reactor? No thanks. Don't like going that fax down. No one ever comes back.
Can you fly it?
Can you fly it... if you have to?
Don't know. There's no way to tell time in here. Two... maybe three months.
Quiet! You wanna get us killed!?
Longer. I wasn't the first one up.
i Shush! We're waiting.
Quiet!
Ssssht!
Never quite felt like sticking around to find out. Running... is always the best option. Believe me.
Ecological Development, Embryonic Charter. Livestock and wildlife re-
You couldn't remember?

It comes only in pieces. Even after a few months. I know everything about this vault and its systems... but I still can't remember where I grew up. Or my brother's name. Only pieces... And the training comes back first. For good reason, I guess.
Dehydrated meatloaf. House special. I save 'em for the weekends.
Do you know how long it would take to turn dehydrated meatloaf into that?
I don't know, but it takes more then a couple years to turn coal into fucking diamonds.
This ship was built to outlast our children's children... and any engineer could tell ya the warranty is running out. I think we've been asleep longer then you may think.
Who the hell is there to call?
We can't get through this way.
It's the safest way to travel. And there's only one other way to get through that I know of.
Main corridor. Hyper-sleep chamber, Personnel. Keep your light down.
Keep quiet.
Keep moving.
What does she do? What's her specialty?
Then she's not in here. This is development settlers. Engineers.
Quiet!
We have to keep moving. We don't want to stay out in the open for too long.
We can't stay herel NADIA heads across the main floor and BOWER tries to wave him on, but TANAKA is locked onto something, refusing to waver.
Then you wait... and find your own way.
I told you I'm not going to wait. I'm not gonna get myself killed for-
What do you think he's doing in there!?
He's hunting! Bagging the next notch on his belt. You wait for him! Good luck.
Don't move.
Where... did it go-?
Run.
Run!
Shut-up!
You want to go back?
We should go back. Find a different path. I don't think we can get through to the reactor bay from-
I'm ready to explore other options-
You really want to discuss it here!?
What are you doing-!?
We gotta find a way out.
I was trying to get us out of there alive-
I was trying to save our asses-
I didn't need to help you at all! You and the Hong-Kong Express would still be playing ding-dong-ditch on level eight if it weren't for me!
I don't know. Gotta be somewhere below B-
No. That's... not possible.
Or something that was already on board, with us in the hyper-bunks.
It's the only theory I can come up with.
I don't know. Like I said, it's the only theory I can think of- Unless...
Could that be real? You think that could-
He was- He was gonna fucking eat me!
He gassed us! He was gonna- All of us!
What is that?
What does that mean?
Done!? What do you mean done? What do we do? Hey!?
What are you talking about? You said you could reset the reactor- That we could-
We weren't meant to go back! We were meant to go on. And now it's more important then ever! We're the last of-
What about your duty? What about... your wife!? There's still a chance she's-
You don't know that for sure!
DON'T DO THAT! DON'T GIVE UP ON ME!
Oh... my... God...
My God. They're... breeding.
There's no where to turn back to. We can't give up-
You didn't tell us anything. You never said that. You said you'd love to come-
What are you doing? What is it?
You think she's... here?
How do you know for sure? She could be-
Well, then... she saved your life.
you... knew her?
Who's... Payton?
Hurry! Go!
Bower...?
You snake bastard- OPEN IT!
Where's... your lieutenant?
What's happened... to us? Where are we?
NO!? Are you crazy-
Not like this! I can't- like this!
I What are you doing!?
No! I can't- Not like this! I'm not going to wake up and drowned-
Where are we? What happened?

He ducks below the tables as a FIGURE slowly enters the room, carrying a long steel spear-like device with a splinter of blinding BLUE FIRE on the tip, fueled with a chemical sprayer like a welder's torch.
NADIA gestures for them to stay put. TANAKA wants to leave, but BOWER grabs his shoulder. They both grip weapons, glancing to NADIA as the HUNTERS seem to be headed their way.
NADIA grabs his arm as bones snap and they slide helplessly to the bottom within a landslide of bones and flesh.
Another place, another time, BOWER leans closer on a bed, watching EVALON sleep. There is a a deep love in his eyes.
Third crossing. Marker D-5381-X.
Which way?
Open bar. Gotta be... E-deck?
